segments.text: Linda , it's really late . Let's call it a day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . We can finish this project the first thing tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure thing . Do you want me to give you a ride home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . Thanks for the ride . I really appreciate 1 it . You know my car is still in the shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . It ’ s my pleasure .
segments.speaker: S1
